protocol_name: Euplotes crassus transformation through microinjection into the macronucleus
protocol_name_html: Euplotes crassus transformation through microinjection into the macronucleus
affiliation: University of Bern, Institute of Biology

groups.group_name: Protist Research to Optimize Tools in Genetics (PROT-G)

components.data: Euplotes crassus cells of two different mating types were diluted 1:10 in artificial sea water and were fed with E.coli (1:1000).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Euplotes crassus cells of two different mating types were diluted 1:10 in artificial sea water and were fed with E.coli (1:1000).

source_data.protocol_name: Euplotes crassus transformation through microinjection into the macronucleus
source_data.protocol_name_html: Euplotes crassus transformation through microinjection into the macronucleus
source_data.annotation:
Recipe for complete seawater (1 L):

36 g Reef Crystals
1 ml Walne's solution
1 ml of 10 μg/ml FeSO4

0.2 ml of 2 mg/ml thiamine (light sensîtive; store at 4ºC)
Add distilled water to 1 L
source_data.thread_text:
Recipe for complete seawater (1 L):

36 g Reef Crystals
1 ml Walne's solution
1 ml of 10 μg/ml FeSO4

0.2 ml of 2 mg/ml thiamine (light sensîtive; store at 4ºC)
Add distilled water to 1 L
source_data.body:
Recipe for complete seawater (1 L):

36 g Reef Crystals
1 ml Walne's solution
1 ml of 10 μg/ml FeSO4

0.2 ml of 2 mg/ml thiamine (light sensîtive; store at 4ºC)
Add distilled water to 1 L
source_data.affiliation: University of Bern, Institute of Biology

components.data: Cells of both mating types were grown at 24ºC for 4 days with a 12h light/12h dark cycle and then mixed at 24ºC (after few hours they started to form pairs).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Cells of both mating types were grown at 24ºC for 4 days with a 12h light/12h dark cycle and then mixed at 24ºC (after few hours they started to form pairs).

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 2 of Euplotes crassus transformation through microinjection into the macronucleus
source_data.protocol_name: Euplotes crassus transformation through microinjection into the macronucleus
source_data.protocol_name_html: Euplotes crassus transformation through microinjection into the macronucleus
source_data.annotation: Areation was provided while cells were growing, but not while cells were mating.
source_data.thread_text: Areation was provided while cells were growing, but not while cells were mating.
source_data.body: Areation was provided while cells were growing, but not while cells were mating.
source_data.affiliation: University of Bern, Institute of Biology

components.data: 50h after formation of the pairs (donut cells) cells were isolated and put into 2% BSA diluted in artificial sea water in order to prepare drops for microinjection (ideally one cell each drop).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: 50h after formation of the pairs (donut cells) cells were isolated and put into 2% BSA diluted in artificial sea water in order to prepare drops for microinjection (ideally one cell each drop).

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 3 of Euplotes crassus transformation through microinjection into the macronucleus
source_data.protocol_name: Euplotes crassus transformation through microinjection into the macronucleus
source_data.protocol_name_html: Euplotes crassus transformation through microinjection into the macronucleus
source_data.annotation:
Cells have a donut shape (anlagen) and macronucleus is easier to inject.
50h after formation of the pairs a round of amplification of the genome occurs.
source_data.thread_text:
Cells have a donut shape (anlagen) and macronucleus is easier to inject.
50h after formation of the pairs a round of amplification of the genome occurs.
source_data.body:

50h after formation of the pairs a round of amplification of the genome occurs.
source_data.affiliation: University of Bern, Institute of Biology

components.data: When drops were ready a layer of Mineral Oil was put above to not let the drops evaporate.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: When drops were ready a layer of Mineral Oil was put above to not let the drops evaporate.

components.data: Phenol/chloroform extracted, precipitated and resuspended in injection buffer (114 mM KCl, 20 mM NaCl, 3 mM sodium phosphate buffer) DNA (artificial nanochromosome with telomeres, but without 3' overhangs) 3-5 μg/μl was injected into the macronucleus using Eppendorf Femtotips II injection needle.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Phenol/chloroform extracted, precipitated and resuspended in injection buffer (114 mM KCl, 20 mM NaCl, 3 mM sodium phosphate buffer) DNA (artificial nanochromosome with telomeres, but without 3' overhangs) 3-5 μg/μl was injected into the macronucleus using Eppendorf Femtotips II injection needle.

components.data: Cells were then recovered in 400 μl of sea water plus E.coli (0.4 μl) at put at 24ºC.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Cells were then recovered in 400 μl of sea water plus E.coli (0.4 μl) at put at 24ºC.
